meanings.definition: A person who dives into hell.
meanings.sent1: The brave helldivers descended fearlessly into the fiery depths.
meanings.sent2: The helldivers explored the fiery underworld with courage.
meanings.sent3: The helldivers joked about needing sunscreen in hell.
meanings.sent4: The helldivers plunged into the fiery abyss like fearless warriors.
meanings.sent5: The image of the helldivers diving into hell was both terrifying and awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: A group of people who dive into hell.
meanings.sent1: The team of helldivers prepared to descend into the depths of hell together.
meanings.sent2: The helldivers worked as a team to explore the fiery underworld.
meanings.sent3: The helldivers planned a potluck in hell for their group dive.
meanings.sent4: The helldivers moved in unison, like a well-oiled machine, into the fiery abyss.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the helldivers descending into hell as a group was both chilling and impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of diving into hell.
meanings.sent1: The helldivers' descent into hell was swift and determined.
meanings.sent2: The helldivers' dive into hell was a daring adventure.
meanings.sent3: The helldivers considered opening a diving school in hell.
meanings.sent4: The helldivers' plunge into hell symbolized their bravery and resolve.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the helldivers' dive into hell lingered in the minds of all who witnessed it.
